serviceDescriptionHome: Our church offers a variety of services to cater to different spiritual needs and schedules. Join us for meaningful worship and community
sundayServiceDescriptionHome: 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM - Join us for a time of worship, teaching, and fellowship. Everyone is welcome!
saturdayServiceDescriptionHome: 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM - A weekend service for those who prefer to gather on Saturday.
onlineServiceDescriptionHome: Thursday at 7:00 PM - Join us online for a midweek service that brings our community together virtually.
